projects.title: YouTuber
projects.description: This project helps anyone to get a playlist or video from youtube to his device, according to the quality needed and the topic selected and many other parameters that makes dealing with the app is such a great oppourtunity and I am glad to make it and got high points and reviews about it :)

projects.title: Flask login template
projects.description: This project is a flask login system made for websites that have a backend through it. The system has a security options and questions. :)

projects.title: the mailer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on developing myself. I had to develop back-end implementation for app that controls a mailing system. This was also my first project in kivy framework. I've learned a lot!
